title: Galaxy Digital Tokenizes Its Shares on Solana With Superstate
summary: Firm's common stock can now be traded as SEC tokens on Superstate's Opening Bell platform, offering new opportunities for investors.

body.raw:
![Galaxy Digital Tokenizes Its Shares on Solana With Superstate](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/s3y3vcno/production/96392f62c216f789b583f15ef11e7ed5a4178859-4823x3617.jpg?auto=format&w=1920&h=1080&crop=focalpoint&fit=clip)

Firm's common stock can now be traded as SEC tokens on Superstate's Opening Bell platform, offering new opportunities for investors.

---

**Original Article:** [CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data](https://www.coindesk.com/business/2025/09/03/galaxy-digital-tokenizes-its-shares-on-solana-with-superstate)
